title: How to connect new devices to Internet

content.question: Which of the following best explains what happens when a new device is connected to the Internet?

choices.label: A device driver is assigned to the device.
An Internet Protocol (IP) address is assigned to the device.
A packet number is assigned to the device.
A Web site is assigned to the device.

content.answer: An Internet Protocol (IP) address is assigned to the device.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Explain how computing systems work.
